poke_power.name: Emperor Aura
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you play Empoleon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Active Pokémon, you may use this power. Your opponent can’t attach any Energy cards from his or her hand to his or her Pokémon during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Steel Wing
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to Empoleon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Whirlpool
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.
